name: Extreme Snow Break
overview: Extreme Snow Break is a ski racing game that features four types of races: - The arcade mode is one-player race, against three other skiers. - The two-player mode you race against a ghost of the other competitor rather than play at the same time. - That leaves the two time modes. Trial is like the one-player game but against the clock rather than other blokes, while the time race is against a ghost of your best course times. This game is known in Japan as Snow Break
